DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate effect BIRT 2584 XX metabolite BI 610100 Pharmacokinetics ( PK ) five probe substrates cytochrome P450 isozymes . The substrate use monitor enzyme activity oral warfarin ( CYP2C9 ) , oral omeprazole ( CYP2C19 ) , oral dextromethorphan ( CYP2D6 ) , oral caffeine ( CYP1A2 ) intravenous midazolam ( hepatic CYP3A )
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Multiple Doses BIRT 2584 XX Tablets Pharmacokinetic Parameters Warfarin , Omeprazole , Caffeine , Dextromethorphan Healthy Male Volunteers
